aas:langStringTextType.aas:text: This model represents a commonly used packing list used in logistics and shipment of goods. It displays goods and their corresponding quantity, as well as, if given the Catena-X Id of the good.
Set of items part of the packing list.
Catena-X ID and data of the packing list item.
Comprises the value of objects and the unit of measurement for the respective items.
Entity for common measurements of an item (mass, count, linear, area, volume, misc) with an unit and a value.
Entity encapsulating the BPNA information from the Sender.
Entity encapsulating the BPNA information from the Receiver.
This model represents a commonly used packing list used in logistics and shipment of goods. It displays goods and their corresponding quantity, as well as, if given the Catena-X Id of the good.

aas:langStringDefinitionTypeIec61360.aas:text: This model represents a commonly used packing list used in logistics and shipment of goods. It displays goods and their corresponding quantity, as well as, if given the Catena-X Id of the good.
The quantity value associated with the unit.
The unit of an item. Common units may be related to mass, count, linear, area, volume or misc.
This property defines common units and the value for items. Items may be measured as mass, countable, miscellaneous, linear, area or volume.
Numbering of all positions or items in the packing list.
Describes the item in the packing list.
Name of the item seen in the packing list.
The Catena-X ID of the given part (e.g. the assembly), valid for the Catena-X dataspace.
Set of items part of the packing list.
Sender of the delivery, including the name and address.
Receiver of the delivery, including the name and address.
